source.name: Current Population Survey Displaced Workers/Job Tenure Supplement
source.description: A national survey conducted to measure the severity of job displacements and assess employment stability during a period of downsizing at many firms, and increased use of temporary and contract labor.  The universe for the survey is all persons who are eligible for the Current Population Survey (CPS) labor force items.  This is a proxy response survey that is sponsored by the Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS).
